Shade:YorickSkull.NAME: Yorick's Skull
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with a #yshade:Zombie. Whenever you play #b10 cards, summon a #yshade:Zombie.

Shade:YorickPolishedSkull.NAME: Yorick's Polished Skull
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with a #yshade:Zombie and 2 #yshade:Skeletons. Whenever you play #b10 cards, summon a #yshade:Zombie and 2 #yshade:Skeletons.

Shade:Thing.NAME: Thing
DESCRIPTIONS: When you return a #yshade:Buried card to your hand or deck, gain #b3 #yBlock.
